sentences.en: A gradient or polarity : wisdom and power à foolishness and weakness.
sentences.cn: 彼此敌对 ﹕ [智慧与权能]->愚拙与软弱.

sentences.en: He viewed it as a balanced polarity between good and evil.
sentences.cn: 他把它看作是善与恶的平衡的两极.

sentences.en: It is not possible to try to salvage or change the polarity correctly by charging.
sentences.cn: 试图补救或通过充电的方法把极性改过来是不可能的.

sentences.en: Level - shifting or polarity inverting circuitry must be employed in these converters.
sentences.cn: 测平移动或者反偏电路必须要用一些转换器.

sentences.en: Objective To reestablish cell polarity of hepatocytes cultured in vitro.
sentences.cn: 目的使培养肝细胞在体外重建细胞极性.

sentences.en: One will only attract opposites in extreme polarity known as dogma.
sentences.cn: 而为什么你趋向于一再创造仿效你双亲的同一类型的配偶或重要的人?

sentences.en: Paid treasure respect to make the response of polarity.
sentences.cn: 支付宝方面做出了截然相反的回应.

sentences.en: Polarity is inherent in a magnet.
sentences.cn: 极性是磁铁的固有性质.

sentences.en: Several people have asked me about the origins of the polarity concept I began exploring last year.
sentences.cn: 有几个人曾问我有关极性概念的由来，极性概念是我去年开始研究的。

sentences.en: Several theories link polarity flips to external disasters such as meteor impacts.
sentences.cn: 有些理论将两极转化现象归因于诸如陨星撞击等外部因素.

sentences.en: Swings in polarity in any creation go from in - breath to out - breath.
sentences.cn: 任何创造物中的两极摆动均从吸收到呼出?圈.

sentences.en: The hydrophobicity is related to molecular volume and polarity.
sentences.cn: 分子的疏水性跟分子的体积和极性有关.

sentences.en: The polarity of the ends of the open - circuit conductor may then be deduced.
sentences.cn: 这样就可以断定开路导体两端的极性.

sentences.en: There are miscellaneous tools, pliers , putty knife, polarity stamps, battery stamping or coding equipment, lead cutters.
sentences.cn: 有各种工具 、 手钳 、 油灰刀, 极性印戮 、 电他标记打印或编号机 、 铅切刀.

sentences.en: Therefore, the proposed improved SBV polarity transfer algorithm is reasonable and effective.
sentences.cn: 因此, 所建议的改进的SBV极性 传递算法是合理和有效的.

sentences.en: Uses the simplex winding polarity reversal method to realize the speed transformation.
sentences.cn: 采用单绕组变极方法实现速度变换.

sentences.en: Whether you want to call it magnetism, polarity,electricity, thought, intelligence or charisma, it's still attraction, and it invests everything—animal, vegetable or mineral.
sentences.cn: 不论你管它叫磁性、极性、活力、体贴、智慧还是魅力，它们都是吸引力，而且它适用于一切------动物、蔬菜或矿物。

words.tran_cn: 极地的；两极的；正好相反的

phrases.tran_cn: 反极性；极性变换；极性倒转

trans.tran_cn: [物]极性，[生]反向性，对立，[数]配极
trans.tran_en: a state in which people, opinions, or ideas are completely different or opposite to each other
